website_summaries.verdict: Classy, pretty color that is practical and versatile, and provides lasting wear under most circumstances. Shade is also easy to touch up, requiring less frequent manicures.
pros: A neutral shade that goes nicely with nearly any outfit, and is suitable to wear for almost any occasion
Feminine, attractive shade has excellent shine
cons: Those who like a bit more color may have to apply two coats to achieve the best results

customer_reviews.title: Matches the lipgloss perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this nail polish again, its nice and true to the color on your hands as opposed to just the bottle. For $15 and its 3 free is ok for me, as opposed to $10 for OPI and you "might" get a color that's slightly off from the way it looks in the bottle. I don't see any difference as far as coats, chipping but this nail polish absolutely dries super fast. Would recommend and re-buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It wouldn’t set up, wouldn’t get hard!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Butter nail polish for years. This is the only bottle I’ve ever gotten that won’t set up . After hours and hours of waiting,something wrong with this bottle, I want my money back! Please! Or another bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: Not The Color in the Picutre
customer_reviews.text: The color looks nothing like the picture. I've been a fan of "Teddy Girl" for some time, but very disappointed that the color was no longer like the pink that is used in the picture/what I am use to.
customer_reviews.author: ProductJNKIE

customer_reviews.title: Goes on like chalk
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if there's some "special" way to apply this product, but I can't say I'm as impressed with this as everyone who told me to purchase this. The end result is this goes on in dry streaks - I'd get better results with coverage if I used plain chalk. Can't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: S.Collins

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too impressed with the quality. for the price i really thought it was going to be something wonderful, it ended up being a lower quality than OPI nail polishes. You have to apply several coats to get a solid color.
customer_reviews.author: YRRB

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't go on as smooth as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't go on as smooth as I would have liked. If you get a darker color you probably only need one coat but this one needs more than 2 to show and it is a very bubbly pink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too thick and it chips off. the color was ...
customer_reviews.text: too thick and it chips off. the color was kinda off too. had to make sure to shake it a lot to even out the red tint. not impressed. 2nd color I've tried and same result.
customer_reviews.author: c.  G.

customer_reviews.title: This polish goes on smooth, dries in minutes and ...
customer_reviews.text: This polish goes on smooth, dries in minutes and keeps a manicure longer than using regular polish (for me one week).
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Chalky
customer_reviews.text: Cute color, but a bit chalky looking. Might look great with a tan or darker skin tones. Hard to apply without getting streaks.
customer_reviews.author: lexiee

customer_reviews.title: Buttery!
customer_reviews.text: The name serves it right and i can see how they got their reputation! The color is perfect. not to dark and not to sheer.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: I have been told what a great product this is
customer_reviews.text: My first butter London purchase. I have been told what a great product this is. Well, I am not sure if this was old or not, but very thick and "sticky". Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cardinale

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try a "healthy" nail polish. I'm not sure if we are getting old polish or a knock off or what but it is awful. Both my sister in law and I ordered and it is streaky and chalky. I seriously can't stand it.
customer_reviews.author: MooseWife

customer_reviews.title: Shop Adorn's polish was pasty, thick and left streaks on my nail which I couldn't cover = pink-white-pink-white-... stripes.Yuck
customer_reviews.text: See description above. The London Butter nail lacquer that I purchased from their company is 100% fantastic!! But, the London Butter nail lacquer that I purchased from Shop Adorn was disgusting!!
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: 7-free doesn't mean it's healthy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It may be 7-free but it's rated a "6" on EWG. Ugh! I was going to go back to Essie (rated a 5 with EWG Skin Deep) but will try Zoya (5-free) because of all the good things I read about it. It was 1 of only 2 out of the 12 nail polishes tested that were really free of the toxic chemicals they claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Momo10

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty pink! ♥
customer_reviews.text: I got "Teddy Girl". It is the most beautiful shade of pastel pink I've ever seen! My skin is extremely pale and on the cool side. I don't think it looks good on me. Would look fabulous on someone with medium - dark skin tones. This colour is also difficult to apply. Very thick and streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Pudgy

customer_reviews.title: Goes on too thick. You can see the lines ...
customer_reviews.text: Goes on too thick. You can see the lines of the brush after it dries.
customer_reviews.author: pdc

product_meta.title: butter LONDON Nail Lacquer, White & Pink Shades, Teddy Girl
product_meta.description:
It is heavily pigmented, high-fashion nail polish. These are rich in color, giving your nails a look that is more vibrant. The vitamin-enriched formula promotes nail strength and provides beautifully consistent coverage.

BRAND STORY
By Butter London
